mapper.select: select store_code as storeCode from t_sys_store where is_delete = 0 and user_code = #{storerCode}

select orderDetails.ord_details_code, orderDetails.buy_count, orderDetails.goods_code, goods.image_url as goodsImg, goods.goods_name, goods.goods_intro, goods.sellprice from t_sys_order_details orderDetails left join t_sys_goods goods on (orderDetails.goods_code = goods.goods_code and goods.is_delete = 0) where orderDetails.is_delete = 0 and orderDetails.order_code = #{orderCode} order by orderDetails.create_time desc , goods.create_time desc

select `order`.order_code, `order`.sum_price, `order`.order_status, `order`.create_time, store.store_name, CONCAT_WS('-',store.province,store.city,store.area,store.detailed_addr) as address, `order`.cus_code, `user`.user_name, `user`.phone, `order`.version from t_sys_order `order` left join t_sys_user `user` on (`order`.cus_code = `user`.user_code and `user`.is_delete = 0) left join t_sys_store store on (`order`.store_code = store.store_code and store.is_delete = 0) where `order`.is_delete = 0 and `order`.order_code = #{orderCode} order by `order`.create_time desc
mapper.update: update t_sys_order set order_status = #{orderStatus}, updater = #{updater}, update_time = now(), version = version + 1 where is_delete = 0 and order_code = #{orderCode} and version = #{version}
